name: Evo-Shape
description:
EvoShape is a top-view shooter survival game. Become one of many shapes and battle your enemies to become the best shape ever! EvoShape offers infinite gameplay and infinite fun. 

 CONTROLS: 

W/A/S/D - movement 

Click - Shoot 

Space - Use Special Ability -- ONLY FROM 2ND EVOLUTION 

 Tutorial: Once you begin the game you start out as a circle. Once you get enough EXP you can evolve into a different shape. Different shapes offer different abilities so it's all up to you - the player to find them out :)
